verses.verse: Hear<WH8085>, you sons<WH1121>, the instruction<WH4148> of a father<WH1>, and attend<WH7181> to know<WH3045> understanding<WH998>.
For I give<WH5414> you good<WH2896> teaching<WH3948>, forsake<WH5800> you not my law<WH8451>.
For I was my father<WH1>'s son<WH1121>, tender<WH7390> and only<WH3173> beloved in the sight<WH6440> of my mother<WH517>.
He taught<WH3384> me also<WH559>, and said unto me<WH3820>, Let your heart retain<WH8551> my words<WH1697>: keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687>, and live<WH2421>.
Get<WH7069> wisdom<WH2451>, get<WH7069> understanding<WH998>: forget<WH7911> it not<WH5186>; neither decline from the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310>.
Forsake<WH5800> her not<WH8104>, and she shall preserve you<WH157>: love her<WH5341>, and she shall keep you.
Wisdom<WH2451> is the principal thing<WH7225>; therefore get<WH7069> wisdom<WH2451>: and with all your getting<WH7075> get understanding<WH998>.
Exalt<WH5549> her<WH7311>, and she shall promote you<WH3513>: she shall bring you to honor, when you do embrace her<WH2263>.
She shall give<WH5414> to your head<WH7218> a ornament<WH3880> of grace<WH2580>: a crown<WH5850> of glory<WH8597> shall she deliver to you<WH4042>.
Hear<WH8085>, O my son<WH1121>, and receive<WH3947> my sayings<WH561>; and the years<WH8141> of your life<WH2416> shall be many<WH7235>.
I have taught<WH3384> you in the way<WH1870> of wisdom<WH2451>; I have led<WH1869> you in right<WH3476> paths<WH4570>.
When you go<WH3212>, your steps<WH6806> shall not be hampered<WH3334>; and when you run<WH7323>, you shall not stumble<WH3782>.
Take fast hold<WH2388> of instruction<WH4148>; let her not go<WH7503>: keep<WH5341> her<WH2416>; for she is your life.
Enter<WH935> not into the path<WH734> of the wicked<WH7563>, and go<WH833> not in the way<WH1870> of evil men<WH7451>.
Avoid<WH6544> it<WH5674>, walk not by it<WH7847>, turn from it<WH5674>, and pass away.
For they sleep<WH3462> not<WH7489>, except they have done mischief; and their sleep<WH8142> is taken away<WH1497>, unless they cause some to fall<WH3782>.
For they eat<WH3898> the bread<WH3899> of wickedness<WH7562>, and drink<WH8354> the wine<WH3196> of violence<WH2555>.
But the path<WH734> of the just<WH6662> is as the shining<WH5051> light<WH216>, that shines<WH215> more<WH1980> and more unto the perfect<WH3559> day<WH3117>.
The way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> is as darkness<WH653>: they know<WH3045> not at what they stumble<WH3782>.
My son<WH1121>, attend<WH7181> to my words<WH1697>; incline<WH5186> your ear<WH241> unto my sayings<WH561>.
Let them not depart<WH3868> from your eyes<WH5869>; keep<WH8104> them in the middle<WH8432> of your heart<WH3824>.
For they are life<WH2416> unto those that find<WH4672> them<WH4832>, and health to all their flesh<WH1320>.
Keep<WH5341> your heart<WH3820> with all diligence<WH4929>; for out of it are the issues<WH8444> of life<WH2416>.
Put away<WH5493> from you a perverse<WH6143> mouth<WH6310>, and perverse<WH3891> lips<WH8193> put far from you<WH7368>.
Let your eyes<WH5869> look<WH5027> right on<WH5227>, and let your eyelids<WH6079> look straight before you<WH3474>.
Ponder<WH6424> the path<WH4570> of your feet<WH7272>, and let all your ways<WH1870> be established<WH3559>.
Turn<WH5186> not to the right hand<WH3225> nor to the left<WH8040>: remove<WH5493> your foot<WH7272> from evil<WH7451>.
